meanings.definition: A unit of currency in France before the adoption of the euro.
meanings.sent1: In the past, people in France used livres to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I found an old coin worth five livres in my grandfather's collection.
meanings.sent3: The livres in the historical movie were actually chocolate coins!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a currency more valuable than any livres.
meanings.sent5: The sound of livres clinking in the cash register was music to his ears.
